channel.title: Help with my Visual Basic Program
channel.description:
Well im making a web browser with tabs but i have a few problems here they are. First is that is there a way to click a button and it adds a new tab to the tab strip control? Second is how do i make the tabs get named to the name of the page?
Thanks Please post a message if you need the code i already have?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: January 07, 2008, 05:48:52 PM[/size][hr]Anyone?
